00130   double error(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target) {
00131     double se = 0;
00132     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00133       Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00134       model(input, output);
00135       for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++) {
00136         if((target(c) <= tmin) && (output(c) <= tmin)) continue;
00137         if((target(c) >= tmax) && (output(c) >= tmax)) continue;
00138         se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00139       }
00140     } else {
00141       Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00142       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00143         model(input[pattern], output);
00144         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++) {
00145           if((target(pattern, c) <= tmin) && (output(c) <= tmin)) continue;
00146           if((target(pattern, c) >= tmax) && (output(c) >= tmax)) continue;
00147           se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00148         }
00149       }
00150     }
00151     // normalise
00152     se /= (double) target.nelem();
00153     return se;
00154   };

00160   double derror(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target,
00161                 bool returnError = true)   {
00162     unsigned i, j;  // denote neurons
00163     unsigned c;     // denotes output
00164     unsigned pos;   // the actual position in the Array dedw
00165     double sum;
00166     double se = 0.;
00167     
00168     dedw  = 0;
00169     
00170     readParameters();
00171     
00172     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00173       // calculate output
00174       activate(input);
00175       
00176       for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++) {
00177         if(((target(c) <= tmin) && (z[i] <= tmin)) ||
00178            ((target(c) >= tmax) && (z[i] >= tmax))) {
00179           d(i) = 0;
00180         } else {
00181           d(i) =  2 * (target(c) - z[i]) * dgOutput(z[i]);
00182           if (returnError)
00183             se += (target(c) - z[i]) * (target(c) - z[i]);
00184         }
00185       }
00186       
00187       // hidden units
00188       for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00189         sum = 0;
00190         for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00191           if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * d(i);
00192         }
00193         d(j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00194       }
00195       
00196       // calculate error gradient
00197       pos = 0;
00198       for(i = inputDimension; i < firstOutputNeuron; i++) {
00199         for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00200           if(connection(i, j)) {
00201             dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00202             pos++;
00203           }
00204         }
00205         if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00206           dedw(pos) -= d(i); 
00207           pos++;
00208         }
00209       }
00210       for(i = firstOutputNeuron; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00211         for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00212           if(connection(i, j)) {
00213             dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00214             pos++;
00215           }
00216         }
00217         if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00218           dedw(pos) -= d(i);
00219           pos++;
00220         }
00221       }
00222     } else { // more than one pattern
00223       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00224         // calculate output
00225         activate(input[pattern]);
00226         
00227         for(i = firstOutputNeuron, c = 0 ; i < numberOfNeurons; i++, c++) {
00228           if(((target(pattern, c) <= tmin) && (z[i] <= tmin)) ||
00229              ((target(pattern, c) >= tmax) && (z[i] >= tmax))) {
00230             d(i) = 0;
00231           } else {
00232             d(i) =  2 * (target(pattern, c) - z[i]) * dgOutput(z[i]);
00233             if (returnError)
00234               se += (target(pattern, c) - z[i]) * (target(pattern, c) - z[i]);
00235           }
00236         }
00237         
00238         // hidden units
00239         for(j = firstOutputNeuron - 1; j >= inputDimension; j--) {
00240           sum = 0;
00241           for(i = j + 1; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00242             if(connection(i, j)) sum += weight(i, j) * d(i);
00243           }
00244           d(j) = dg(z[j]) * sum;
00245         }
00246         
00247         // calculate error gradient
00248         pos = 0;
00249         for(i = inputDimension; i < firstOutputNeuron; i++) {
00250           for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00251             if(connection(i, j)) {
00252               dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00253               pos++;
00254             }
00255           }
00256           if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00257             dedw(pos) -= d(i); 
00258             pos++;
00259           }
00260         }
00261         for(i = firstOutputNeuron; i < numberOfNeurons; i++) {
00262           for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00263             if(connection(i, j)) {
00264               dedw(pos) -= d(i) * z[j];
00265               pos++;
00266             }
00267           }
00268           if(connection(i, bias)) {  // bias
00269             dedw(pos) -= d(i);
00270             pos++;
00271           }
00272         }
00273       }
00274     }
00275     dedw /= (double) target.nelem(); // mt & igel 20010917
00276     if (returnError)
00277       se /= (double) target.nelem(); // mt & igel 20010917
00278     else
00279       se = -1;
00280     return se;
00281   };
